thread.title: BRIEF-Huarong International Financial Holdings Sees FY Profit Attributable Rising Not Less Than 60%

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Huarong International Financial Holdings Sees FY Profit Attributable Rising Not Less Than 60%

organizations.name: reuters) - huarong international financial holdings ltd

text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Huarong International Financial Holdings Ltd:
* EXPECTED TO RECORD AN INCREASE OF NOT LESS THAN 60% IN PROFIT ATTRIBUTABLE TO OWNERS OF COMPANY FOR FY​
* EXPECTED RESULT DUE TO INCREASE IN OPERATING PROFIT FROM ASSET MANAGEMENT AND DIRECT INVESTMENT SEGMENT​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
